item.title: Little Umbrella makes the funding rain after success of Death by AI social game
item.description: Little Umbrella, an emerging pioneer in AI-powered social games, has raised $2 million in funding after the success of its Death by AI social game.

item.title: Ai2 releases Tülu 3, a fully open-source model that bests DeepSeek v3, GPT-4o with novel post-training approach
item.description: DeepSeek-R1 released model code and pre-trained weights but not training data. Ai2 is taking a different approach to be more open.
